Package info.kgeorgiy.ja.Podtsepko.implementor

Class Implementor

java.lang.Object
info.kgeorgiy.ja.Podtsepko.implementor.Implementor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Impler, JarImpler
public class Implementor extends Object implements Impler, JarImpler
Implementation of interfaces Impler and JarImpler, providing tools for automating the implementation of interfaces, compiling the default implementation and generating .jar files with corresponding classes.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Entry point of Implementor.

      Accepts one argument - the name of the interface to implement, or three arguments - -jar, the name of the interface to implement, and the name of the jar file.

      Parameters:
      args - Implementor's arguments

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if arguments is valid, false otherwise

    • check

      private static void check(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Checks that the token is public interface and root is not null.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for
      root - root directory
      Throws:
      ImplerException - If some argument is invalid.

    • implement

      public void implement(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Produces code implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      The suffix Impl is added to the interface name. The generated source code is placed in the specified directory root. For example, the implementation of the interface list will be placed in $root/java/util/ListImpl.java.

      Specified by:
      implement in interface Impler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for
      root - root directory
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • getClassLoader

      public static URLClassLoader getClassLoader(Path root) throws MalformedURLException
      Creates and returns ClassLoader for the root directory
      Parameters:
      root - root directory
      Returns:
      ClassLoader for the root directory
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException

    • getClassFilePath

      private static Path getClassFilePath(Class<?> token, Path root) throws ImplerException
      Creates the path to the file where the implementation should be placed and creates directories from this path.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for
      root - root directory
      Returns:
      the path to the file where the implementation should be placed
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if it is not possible to create directories from the file path.

    • getPathToImpl

      private static Path getPathToImpl(Class<?> token)
      Returns relative path to file where the implementation should be placed.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for
      Returns:
      relative path to file where the implementation should be placed

    • implementJar

      public void implementJar(Class<?> token, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Produces .jar file implementing class or interface specified by provided token.

      The suffix Impl is added to the interface name.

      Specified by:
      implementJar in interface JarImpler
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for
      jarFile - target .jar file
      Throws:
      ImplerException - when implementation cannot be generated.

    • compile

      private void compile(Class<?> token, Path output) throws ImplerException
      Compiles implemented interface by interface token (the interface should already be implemented).
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for
      output - root directory for compiler output
      Throws:
      ImplerException - if missing Java compiler or implementation cannot be compiled.

    • export

      private void export(Class<?> token, Path build, Path jarFile) throws ImplerException
      Generate .jar with interface implementation.
      Parameters:
      token - type token to create implementation for
      build - root directory of compiled interface implementation
      jarFile - target .jar file
      Throws:
      ImplerException - If there was some kind of IOException while working with the .jar file
